title: Everything you need to know about the 1Xtra Live 2019 acts
text:
1Xtra Live 2019 takes us to Birmingham and will once again bring together the most exciting homegrown names as well the biggest global stars.

This year’s event will see show-stopping performances from the likes of US superstar French Montana, hot UK talent like Aitch and Ms Banks and a special hometown set from Brummie grime star JayKae.

New acts just announced include Nigeria's Wizkid, Dominican-American artist DaniLeigh and Tottenham's own Miraa May. Plus, there will be surprises on the night too!

Here’s what to expect from this year’s star-studded bill so far...
description: 1Xtra Live 2019 in Birmingham will feature homegrown talent and the biggest global stars.
